thread.section_title: Nutrients Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nutrients Direct | nutrientsdirect.com.au
thread.title: Kirsty GB
thread.title_full: Nutrients Direct reviewed by Kirsty GB

author: Kirsty GB
title: Kirsty GB
text:
Delivered within 1 business day and received confirmations via email following payment, dispatch and delivery which was reassuring.
I like that it's a local distributor and product is 100% Inulin sourced from a country that I have more confidence in (I.e. I'm less concerned that it has been exposed to substandard processes that involve unnecessary chemicals and the dodgy addition of fillers). I realise you can never be 100% sure but I don't have any immediate concerns.
